hackathon-description-text: Anvil Hack II is a student run hackathon focused on the creative applications of technology (this is not a prototyping session for your new startup!) taking place at a centre of creative computing research - Goldsmiths University of London
hackathon-eligibility: Our Hackathon is amined at students, but anyone can enter.
hackathon-requirements: Make sure you link to your degeration it blog post in your write up
hackathon-rules:
You must abide by the Goldsmiths SU safe space policy and the MLH code of conduct
Teams must have 4 or less people to be eligable for prizes.

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: All projects chosen by our judges will be given a super rare extremely valuable vinyl sticker
The most creative use of chirps api will win a raspberry pi for each member of their team
The best blog post on degerationit.com will get a Rasperry Pi 3 for each member of their team.
The best project that incorporates machine learning will win drones for each of their team
Best music hack - Prize: 6 months Spotify Premium / One of 8 Gramofons.
A leap motion for Improbables fav hack.
The best hack with a .tech domain wins a $50 amazon voucher for each member of their team
Build the best developer tool to win.
Use your free domain.com domain in your project. Use the best domain to win. We're after funny, witty or clever names!

hackathon-location-google-maps: https://maps.google.com/?q=Goldsmiths College, 80 Lewisham Way, London SE14 6PB, UK
hackathon-location-address: Goldsmiths College, 80 Lewisham Way, London SE14 6PB, UK
hackathon-description-header: Goldsmiths annual student lead hackathon, based on using technology creatively
hackathon-location-description: St James Church, Goldsmiths University of London
